about_the_game:
"The Mofflys," a VR party game, combines alien shenanigans, hilarious jokes, and lively mini-games across four worlds. Launch your invasion of Earth to spread mayhem and laughter as the most amusing murder clone in the galaxy. Ideal for players seeking a fun-filled space adventure, "The Mofflys" delivers endless laughter through masterful VR and comedic moments, ensuring every invasion is enjoyably unforgettable.




Navigate four distinct environments: the Wild West, Undersea, Outer Space, and Ancient Egypt, each offering unique challenges and hilarity. Claim your comedic dominion over Earth as you explore these diverse settings, making every conquest as humorous as it is triumphant. Ready for adventure, you'll find laughter and surprises at every turn.




Tackle 10 mini-games that challenge your agility and wit. From capturing critters in the Wild West to battling ancient Egyptian skulls, each game is packed with fun and laughs. Designed for excitement and amusement, these games ensure your journey through "The Mofflys" is filled with laughter and lively moments.




Arm yourself with the most eclectic array of weaponry the galaxy has to offer in "The Mofflys." From the precision of small laser pistols to the sheer power of massive gatling blaster guns, every weapon brings its own unique flavor to the battlefield. Each weapon not only looks distinct but also offers different gameplay mechanics, bringing their own style of cosmic conquest.




Immerse yourself in a universe where dumb alien jokes are central. With cinematic scenes that blend stunning visuals with humor, meet quirky aliens whose jokes guarantee a good laugh. "The Mofflys" isn't just a game; it's a comedic journey through space, making every moment hilariously memorable.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 / AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR supported VR Headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR supported VR Headset

short_description: Join your alien squad on a thrilling mission to invade planet Earth and plunge the universe into chaos! Traverse through four iconic Earthly regions, each bursting with excitement, diverse objectives, and the opportunity to combat Earth's greatest defenders in epic battles.
